description: A land yacht in powder blue. This full-size sedan was built for comfort, not speed — but it has a surprisingly stout V6 hiding under that enormous hood. Drop a cam and some bolt-ons and this thing becomes a terrifying sleeper that nobody sees coming.
lore: Every crew has one — the car that looks like it should be parked outside a bingo hall. But Grandma's Sedan has surprised more than a few cocky drivers at The Pit. That V6 has torque for days, and the sheer mass means nobody pushes you off line.
